text: Need some advice  post suicide attempt It s been three weeks since I attempted  told my parents almost two days after my failed attempt I m telling you all asking for help feels so good  if you are thinking of attempting  ask for help  it might not feel the best way right now but trust me asking help is the one thing you need anyways I m here for advice about something else Since I told my parents  slowly my family  cousins  uncle  started asking questions  now I know that they all care about me and want my best  but every time that I answer these questions  it is like a mini experience of that day when I almost died What do you suggest I should do
